oai_dc:dc.dc:title: William A. Newell discharge certificate
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Military discharge certificate for Pvt. William A. Newell, W. Y. Erline's Co. A, 50th Ohio Vol. Inf. Regt., USA. Newall enlisted on July 26, 1862 and discharged on June 26, 1865 at Salisbury, N. C. The 99th Ohio Vol. Inf. Regt. was consolidated with the 50th Ohio in December 1864.
